author: Jessica Earnshaw
title: BRIT Awards 2017: Katy Perry threatens to STORM OFF during awkward red carpet interview | TV & Radio | Showbiz & TV | Express.co.uk
text:
Wait, I’m not done! I’m trying to tell a story! Katy Perry 
However, things got worse after Lilah said: "You’re back, how does it feel?" to which she replied: "I never left, honey, I never left. 
"I just took a little time for myself and it feels good. I write all my own songs and I’ve written over 40 songs for this next record. Not all of them are great!" 
After getting distracted by people yelling in the crowd, George attempted to move the conversation on but she shouted: "Wait, I’m not done! I’m trying to tell a story!" FACEBOOK BRIT Awards 2017: Katy Perry's interviewers seemed shocked as she walked off GETTY BRIT Awards 2017: Katy Perry flashed her pins in a show-stopping creation 
Katy went on to reveal that she was "so sick" when she won her first BRIT and it was Natalie Imbruglia who comforted her. 
Things got even more awkward when she swiftly handed the microphone back to George and strutted off, despite him calling after her. 
"Do you want to do a mic drop? No?" he said, before flashing a tense glance at the camera. Related articles
